name: Final Mission (itch) (Maxioa007)
description:
A lone pilot was sent on a suicide assignment, to defend earth from the enemy army for 5 minutes and act as a distraction until reinforcements arrive.

 He was told that should an enemy mech engage him, he was to avoid confrontation at all cost. That was the one order he would disobey, as those giant humanoid war-machines were what got us in this mess in the first place. And one less in the battlefield is a tremendous advantage.

How long will he last? Will his contribution tip the scales in any meaningful way? Can a space ship designed for racing outfitted with a pea-shooter defeat a giant robot built for warfare?

 No matter, all that is left for the pilot, is to carry out his final mission.
